objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Comedy lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to work and career in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about work and career using formal register
Students create original comedy themed content about work and career in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Comedy story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using formal register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in formal register within comedy theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
